greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of f(x, x^4) in powers of x where f(, ) is Ramanujan's general theta function.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: The characteristic function of A085787 generalized heptagonal numbers.
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ -x, x^5] QPochhammer[ -x^4, x^5] QPochhammer[ x^5], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Oct 31 2015 *)
a[ n_] := SquaresR[ 1, 40 n + 9] / 2; (* _Michael Somos_, Jan 30 2017 *)
a[ n_] := If[n < 0, 0, Boole @ IntegerQ @ Sqrt @ (40 n + 9)]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jan 30 2017 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Sep 11 2007
